definition: canon/law/standard work of scholarship/literary quotation or allusion/ceremony/to be in charge of/to mortgage or pawn

sentences.english: The beauty host displayed the professional with fluent English.
sentences.chinese: 主持人用流利英語開始了慶典，展現了樂其的專業性。

sentences.english: Since then, horses have only been used for ceremonial events or public relations.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，馬就只用於慶典或公關場合了。

sentences.english: Gion Matsuri, which is one of the most famous festivals in Japan, takes place in Kyoto, too.
sentences.chinese: 日本最有名慶典之一的祇園祭也在京都舉行。

sentences.english: 2005 september , d . phone ' s 12th anniversary celebration held in beijing.
sentences.chinese: 2005年9月迪信通十二週年慶典在北京隆重舉行。

sentences.english: Champaign is associated with celebration in current human thought-form.
sentences.chinese: 香檳在人類當前思想形態中用來慶祝慶典。

sentences.english: Non-participation at the rehearsals and the gala concert results in loss of the prize.
sentences.chinese: 不參加彩排和慶典音樂會的選手將失去獎項。

sentences.english: Amid all the pomp and celebration, one of the darker aspects to the wedding was how thin she was too.
sentences.chinese: 圍繞着盛況和慶典，美中不足的一點是，新娘太瘦了。

sentences.english: Artoo was refurbished in time for the celebration of the Rebel victory.
sentences.chinese: R2被及時修理後，參加了起義軍的勝利慶典。

sentences.english: Almsgiving is, to some extent, a religious ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 救濟是，在某種程度上，一個宗教慶典活動。

sentences.english: Big anniversaries come and go, but moments like this arise only rarely.
sentences.chinese: 大型年度慶典來來往往，但像這樣的時刻很出現。

sentences.english: In each new system, you can see it takes on a new meaning always with respect to whatever it is not.
sentences.chinese: 在每一個新的系統裏，在情人節點燈慶典上紅燈表示。

sentences.english: Our class was represented at the anniversary by the monitor.
sentences.chinese: 我班由班長代表出席慶典。

sentences.english: While Disney allowed all the outdoor elements of the celebration to be free to the public.
sentences.chinese: 迪斯尼樂園的所以外部慶典活動都想大衆免費開放。

sentences.english: Be responsible to organize and coordinate kinds of celebration and activities.
sentences.chinese: 負責組織與協調各類慶典和公司活動。

sentences.english: Welcome to Washington, and welcome to this celebration of American renewal.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到華盛頓，歡迎參見這次美國履新的慶典。

sentences.english: The restaurant held a wedding reception earlier in the night.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，頭天晚上這個餐館舉辦了一場結婚慶典。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
